name: Flesh? Rock? Mountain!
description:
Flesh? Rock? Mountain! is a game where the player and the mountain are joined together, as the character is a representation of the mountain, or vice versa.

You must defeat the big evil in this great adventure, by wandering through immersive rooms, filled with all the details imaginable (no).

Dialogue transcription in case it goes too fast:

"Inside a mountain, a mountain person lives. Is the mountain made out of flesh? Or are they made out of mountain? They scream, for they do not know. I came here, following the screams... So... The propechy... It was true... What I mean is that it was told that one day, when the mountain were in great danger, it'll come alive and fight those who hurt it. And it is you, you are the mountain. Either that or somehow you and the mountain are joined together, which I think is, technically, the same. To use the keys, just walk past the doors, and they'll open. Press X to use a bomb. But beware!! As you are the mountain, you will take damage each time one goes off. Now, go away, and may the luck be with you."

PS: I know that with PICO-8 everybody's able to look the source code of a game so, please, do not do it. For your own sanity, you are warned. It is horrendous. But it somehow works, so I'm not gonna complain that much.

Also, given that this is my first finished game, I'm more than satisfied with the result.

Have fun.
